title: Stage Lv9-P1-S06
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Do you think he's lazy? Far from it – he works tirelessly.
The results were disappointing, to put it mildly.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그가 게으르다고 생각하십니까? 결코 그렇지 않습니다 - 그는 쉼 새 없이 일합니다.
sentences.en: Do you think he's lazy? Far from it – he works tirelessly.
The results were disappointing, to put it mildly.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 자격이 있다고 생각하십니까? 결코 그렇지 않습니다 - 오히려 과자격입니다.
sentences.en: Do you think she's qualified? Far from it – she's overqualified.
The situation was challenging, to put it mildly.

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트가 쉽다고 생각하십니까? 결코 그렇지 않습니다 - 매우 복잡합니다.
sentences.en: Do you think this project is easy? Far from it – it's extremely complex.

sentences.kr: 반응이 바람직하지 않았다고, 완곡하게 표현하자면 그렇습니다.
sentences.en: The response was less than ideal, to put it mildly.

sentences.kr: 그들이 협조적이었다고 생각하십니까? 결코 그렇지 않습니다 - 오히려 방해가 되었습니다.
sentences.en: Do you think they were cooperative? Far from it – they were obstructive.

sentences.kr: 첫 시도가 전적으로 실패했다고, 완곡하게 표현하면 그렇습니다.
sentences.en: The first attempt was a complete failure, to put it mildly.
